001package org.nasdanika.persistence;
002
003import java.net.URL;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Map;
006
007import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
008import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
009
010/**
011 * Objects which know how to store themselves to a {@link Map}, {@link List}, or scalar like String, Number, Boolean or Date
012 * may implement this interface so they can be stored to a hierarchical structure like YAML or JSON.
013 * Also this interface may be used as an adapter interface. In this case an object to be stored is adapted to this interface.
014 * @author Pavel
015 *
016 */
017public interface ContextStorable {
018        
019        Object store(Context context, URL base, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor);       
020
021}
